sentence: In trading on Monday, shares of Procter & Gamble Co. (Symbol: PG) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $84.82, changing hands as high as $85.00 per share.
Procter & Gamble Co. shares are currently trading up about 0.2% on the day.

The chart below shows the one year performance of PG shares, versus its 200 day moving average:

Looking at the chart above, PG's low point in its 52 week range is $77.29 per share, with $93.89 as the 52 week high point - that compares with a last trade of $84.85.
According to the ETF Finder at ETF Channel, PG makes up 12.88% of the Consumer Staples Select Sector SPDR Fund ETF (Symbol: XLP) which is trading up by about 0.4% on the day Monday.
